title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 479.1 - Purpose and scope
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6 ยง 479.1 - Purpose and scope

State Regulations

The purpose of this Part is to provide for the
participation by the Department of Environmental Conservation in the Council of

Contracting Agencies established by Executive Order No. 125, dated May 22, 1989, in order to enhance the availability of and access to information
relevant to the statutory determination by the Department of Environmental

Conservation of the responsibility and reliability of low bidders for the award
of construction contracts, and certain service contracts, and the approval of
subcontractors relative to such contracts. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 6
ยง
479.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
